metadata.title: CVE-2024-31047 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in Academy Software Foundation openexr v.3.2.3 and before allows alocal attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) via the convert functionof exrmultipart.cpp.

criterions.comment: openexr package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
